docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 22-With the arrest last night of the last of eight Nazi leaders indicted Friday and charged with conspiring against Uruguay's sovereignty, South America's smallest republic is preparing to bring Germany's Nazi party to...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 22-With the arrest last night of the last of eight Nazi leaders indicted Friday and charged with conspiring against Uruguay's sovereignty, South America's smallest republic is preparing to bring Germany's Nazi party to trial before world public opinion.
docs.abstract: A Fuhrmann, J Holzer, R Meissner, O Klein, R Paetz, A Dutine, R Becker, F S Gordon, Nazis, to be tried; indictment text; Foreign Min A Guani gives out text of note to German Min O Langmann on J Dalldorf and other Nazi activities

headline.main: URUGUAY WILL TRY NAZIS AS PLOTTERS; Party and Its Chiefs Indicted for Scheme to Seize Nation as a Colony of the Reich

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO Uruguay, Sept. 23--The trial of eight Nazi leaders charged with conspiracy to seize Uruguay as a German colony began today, within twenty-four hours after the indictment against them had been issued and the bringing of the last three...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO Uruguay, Sept. 23--The trial of eight Nazi leaders charged with conspiracy to seize Uruguay as a German colony began today, within twenty-four hours after the indictment against them had been issued and the bringing of the last three defendants from interior points to Montevideo yesterday.
docs.abstract: Repts alleged instructions to German groups in Uruguay by German Legation

headline.main: URUGUAY RUSHES TRIAL OF 8 NAZIS; Examining Judge for Supreme Court Opens Hearings on German Colony' Charge CASES OF FIVE REACHED Procedure Reviews Complaints, Previously. Dropped, of Plan to Undermine Republic

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The decision of Uruguay to expose through her courts Nazi methods of conquering other countries from within will be welcomed by all the nations of this hemisphere.
docs.lead_paragraph: The decision of Uruguay to expose through her courts Nazi methods of conquering other countries from within will be welcomed by all the nations of this hemisphere.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 24--Uruguay's highest ranking general, accompanied by the chief of military aviation, left here today for Washington in response to an invitation to Latin-American republics to send two officers each to tour military...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 24--Uruguay's highest ranking general, accompanied by the chief of military aviation, left here today for Washington in response to an invitation to Latin-American republics to send two officers each to tour military establishments of the United States.
